amendment.description: to support full funding for High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 253 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 253 proposed by Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S2939-2940, S2948-2949, S2952; text: CR S2940) to support full funding for High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 253 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
